Invocation Name: smart shower
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Thermasol’s Alexa Skill! 

Make your Thermasol Steam Shower even smarter by connecting it with your Alexa!

With simple voice commands, you can turn on your steam, shower, and lights to your desired setting before entering the shower with any Alexa device. 

To start, please be sure and link the account credentials provided to you in your ThermaTouch device under
settings/alexa with this skill.

List of commands:

Alexa, tell smart shower to…

LOG IN
...login in user one
...login in user two
STEAM
…turn on steam
...start steam
…turn off steam
...stop steam
...set steam timer to (1-60) minutes
...change steam timer to (1-60) minutes
...set steam temp to (80-120) degrees
...change steam temp to (80-120) degrees
SHOWER
...turn on shower
...turn off shower
...set water temp to (60-120) degrees
...change water temp to (60-120) degrees
...increase water pressure
...decrease water pressure
...change water to handheld
...change water to rain
...change water to shower
LIGHT
...turn on light
...turn off light
...turn on white light
...turn on red light
...turn on blue light
...turn on orange light
...turn on yellow light
...turn on green light
...turn on violet light
...turn on indigo light
...turn on mood light
...change light to white
...change light to red
...change light to blue
...change light to orange
...change light to yellow
...change light to green
...change light to violet
...change light to indigo
...change light to mood
SHUTDOWN
…shutdown
...turn off


If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact our customer care team at (800) 776-0711, or alexa@thermasol.com 


DISCLAIMER: This skill is meant to be used while in the home and within close proximity of the shower, do not use this feature if you are outside
of this area. Ensure that your shower door is closed before use. 

NOTE:
Read and understand your ThermaSol installation and operation instructions thoroughly before operating your steam/shower with Alexa. This skill only works with Thermatouch devices.
